text: M. Vishnu alias Jushnu (7) of Puduchatram died on the spot after he was hit by a two-wheeler while crossing the Bengaluru – Madurai National Highway outside his school here on Friday. The police said that his grandfather Varadarajan dropped him on the other side of the road in a two-wheeler. While he was trying to cross the road, a motorcycle hit him. But, he died on the way to a private hospital in Namakkal. Later, the body was taken to District Government Headquarters Hospital for post-mortem.
title: Boy killed in accident
